name: Snowdown Mowdown
description:
Spend a snowday mowing down other children with snowballs as you sled down the neighborhood hill!

Controls:

A: Left

D: Right

Mouse-click: Fire

Game created by:

Art: Liam Fitch, Vallhalla Vilarreal, Dan Stenmetz

Design: Casey Jarmes, Ishan Dutta, Sebastian Pedersen, Gabriel Williamssen, Darrel Jay Stagen

Programming: Ian Jeannin, Adrian Yogore, Sam Hirsch

Sound: Casey Huffer
